mapper.select: SELECT CEIL(COUNT(i_product) / #{recordCntPerPage}) FROM pd_board WHERE category = #{category}

SELECT A.i_product , A.category , A.product_seq , A.product_title , A.product_ctnt , A.product_nm , A.brand , A.price , A.sales , A.final_price , A.product_dt , A.i_user , B.nm , C.star_rt , IFNULL(C.review_cnt, 0) AS review_cnt FROM pd_board A
LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i_product , COUNT(i_product) AS review_cnt , star_rt FROM order_review GROUP BY i_product ) C ON A.i_product = C.i_product
WHERE A.i_product = #{iProduct} AND A.category = #{category}

SELECT A.i_product , A.category , A.product_seq , A.product_title , A.product_ctnt , A.product_nm , A.brand , A.price , A.sales , A.final_price , A.product_dt , B.i_user , B.nm , C.pd_img , D.star_rt , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM pd_board WHERE category = A.category), 0) AS product_cnt , IFNULL(D.review_cnt, 0) AS review_cnt , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM pd_scrap E WHERE E.i_product = A.i_product AND E.i_user = #{iUser}), 0) AS scrap_chk FROM pd_board A
LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM pd_photo WHERE pdimg_seq = 1 ) C ON A.i_product = C.i_product
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i_product , COUNT(i_product) AS review_cnt , star_rt FROM order_review GROUP BY i_product ) D ON A.i_product = D.i_product
WHERE A.category = #{category} ORDER BY A.product_dt DESC LIMIT #{sIdx}, #{recordCntPerPage}

SELECT A.i_product , A.category , A.product_seq , A.product_title , A.product_ctnt , A.product_nm , A.brand , A.price , A.sales , A.final_price , A.product_dt , B.i_user , B.nm , C.pd_img , D.star_rt , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM pd_board WHERE category = A.category), 0) AS product_cnt , IFNULL(D.review_cnt, 0) AS review_cnt FROM pd_board A
LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM pd_photo WHERE pdimg_seq = 1 ) C ON A.i_product = C.i_product
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i_product , COUNT(i_product) AS review_cnt , star_rt FROM order_review GROUP BY i_product ) D ON A.i_product = D.i_product
WHERE product_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') ORDER BY product_dt DESC
LIMIT #{sIdx}, #{recordCntPerPage}
